unnormalised: Hey guys! Ever scrolled through your Instagram feed and wondered, "How did *that* go viral?" We've all been there, seeing some random video of a chaiwala in Chandni Chowk suddenly blowing up. Virality, my friends, is the unicorn of social media marketing.
